Scheme Name: Skill Development (Wadia Institute of Himalayan Geology)
Description: Skill-based Earth Science training for postgraduates.

Scheme Name: Construction of Ideal Fish Pond Scheme in Hilly Areas
Description: 50% subsidy for pond construction and inputs for fish farming in hilly areas.
Scholarship for NCC cadets pursuing higher education who have completed two years of training.
Grants, loans, and margin money assistance for PwDs to start self-employment ventures.

Scheme Name: Financial Incentive to SC Meritorious Girls Students
Description: Financial incentive of ₹5,000 to SC girls who secure 80%+ in HSLC exams to encourage higher studies.
